articles.title: Former ICC CEO Haroon Lorgat appointed as USA's National Cricket League commissioner

articles.title: When should Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma retire? Here's what Kapil Dev said about a cricketer's prime years

articles.title: ‘It’s fucked … most people know that’: Sports podcasters speak out over gambling ad influence
